Turf pushing/dragging roller is very suitable for leveling uneven ground caused by moles or frost heaving, and it is also suitable for packing newly sown seed or turf. It can be filled with water or sand. The steel drum has rounded edges to get the best rolling effect, and the lawn will not be damaged when it rotates.
Note
a. Rolling is not recommended when turfgrass is weak.
b. Try to avoid high intensity rolling on wet soil to avoid soil slumping, which may affect the growth of turfgrass.
c. On overly dry soil, avoid heavy rolling to prevent compaction of the lawn.
d. It should be combined with management measures such as perforation, thinning and harrowing, fertilization and sand mulching.
